Function reference

Habitat Models

New York Bight Ecological Model Habitat Models

nybem_submodels
NYBEM Submodels

Calculate Habitat Suitability Index Values

Computes suitability indices given a set of suitability curves and project-specific inputs.

SIcalc()
Calculate Suitability Indices

Calculate Habitat Suitability Index (HSI)

Calculates the habitat suitability index for the input suitability indices.

HSIcalc()
Calculate Habitat Suitability Index (HSI)

Visualization

Helps display habitat suitability model data

HSIplotter()
Plots habitat suitability index curves
raster_fig()
Create a Raster Figure

Habitat Zonation

Delineates habitat zones from input raster datasets.

set_habitat_zone()
Set Habitat Zone
set_salinity_zone()
Set Salinity Zone
set_tidal_zone()
Create a Tidal Zone Raster

Is Catagorical Raster?

Has Colortable?
